27.eng-name: Chapters on Righteousness And Maintaining Good Relations With Relatives
27.ara-name: كتاب البر والصلة عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Abu Umamah narrated that the Messenger of Allah (s.A.W) said:"Al-Haya' and Al-'Iy are two branches of faith, and Al-Badha and Al-Bayan are two branches of Hypocrisy

chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About Al-Haya' and Al-'Iy
